  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/527</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/527</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Habitants del planeta</string>
            <string language="en">Inhabitants of the planet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einwohner des Planeten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Habitants de la planète</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Habitantes do planeta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abitanti del pianeta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάτοικοι του πλανήτη</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Crèdit interactiu sobre els cinc regnes i la classificació dels éssers vius. Conté informació, guia didàctica, activitats i enllaços externs (amb la possibilitat de recórrer tres trajectes diferents: bàsic, ampliat i complet). Accés restringit a usuaris edu365 i xtec.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive credit on the five kingdoms and the classification of living beings. It includes information, teaching guide, activities and external links (with the possibility of doing three different itineraries: basic, extended and full). Access is restricted to registered users of edu365 and xtec websites.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">botànica</string>
            <string language="en">botany</string>
            <string language="es">botánica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">classificació</string>
            <string language="en">classification</string>
            <string language="es">clasificación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">microbiologia</string>
            <string language="en">microbiology</string>
            <string language="es">microbiología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">zoologia</string>
            <string language="en">zoology</string>
            <string language="es">zoología</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive Gutschrift auf den fünf Königreichen
und die Klassifikation der lebenden Wesen. Er schließt 
Informationen, unterrichtende Anleitung, Aktivitäten und externe 
Links ein (mit der Möglichkeit des Tuns von von drei 
unterschiedlichen Reisewegen: grundlegend, ausgedehnt und voll).
Greifen Sie wird eingeschränkt auf zugelassene Benutzer von 
edu365 und von xtec Web site zu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Degré de solvabilité interactif sur les cinq royaumes et la 
classification des êtres vivants. Elle inclut l'information, le
guide d'enseignement, les activités et les liens externes (avec la 
possibilité de faire trois itinéraires différents : de base, 
étendu et plein). Accédez est limité aux utilisateurs 
enregistrés d'edu365 et de sites Web de xtec.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crédito interativo nos cinco reinos e a 
classificação de seres vivos. Inclui a informação, a guia 
ensinando, as atividades e as ligações externas (com a possibilidade
de fazer três itineraries diferentes: básico, prolongado e 
cheio). Alcance é restringido aos usuários registados de 
edu365 e de Web site do xtec.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accreditamento interattivo sui cinque regni e la 
classificazione degli esseri viventi. Include le informazioni, 
la guida d'istruzione, le attività ed i collegamenti esterni (con la 
possibilità di fare tre itinerari differenti: di base, esteso e
pieno). Accedi a si limita agli utenti registrati di edu365 e 
dei Web site del xtec.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική πίστωση στα πέντε βασίλεια και η ταξινόμηση
των ζωντανών οντων. Περιλαμβάνει τις πληροφορίες, τον οδηγό 
διδασκαλίας, τις δραστηριότητες και τις εξωτερικές συνδέσεις (με 
τη δυνατότητα τρεις διαφορετικές περιηγήσεις: βασικές, 
εκτεταμένος και πλήρης). Η πρόσβαση είναι περιορισμένη 
στους εγγραμμένους χρήστες edu365 και xtec των ιστοχώρων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Botanik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klassifikation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikrobiologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zoologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">botanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">classification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">microbiologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">zoologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">botany</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">classificação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">microbiology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">zoology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">botanica</string>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-el">μικροβιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ζωολογία</string>
          </keyword>
